corrupted_reasoning: The corrupted fact misrepresents the Scholars' reaction to the invention and the consequences of its demonstration. It contrasts his initial assignment as a Street Sweeper with his later plans to pursue knowledge, rebuild achievements, and create a new society, highlighting his personal growth and rejection of societal constraints.
corrupted_reasoning: The corrupted fact incorrectly states that Equality 7-2521 plans to return to the City to accept his role as a Street Sweeper and promote unquestioning obedience. It connects Equality 7-2521's childhood memory of witnessing a Transgressor's punishment with his later discovery of the word "I" and its importance in his philosophy of individualism.
corrupted_reasoning: The corrupted fact incorrectly identifies the Unspeakable Word as "We" and attributes positive connotations to it. In reality, the Unspeakable Word is "I," and Equality 7-2521 condemns the concept of "We" as a destructive force while elevating "I" as a representation of individuality and human spirit.
